name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior WebTest Engineer with over 10 years of experience in backend development, seamlessly transitioning into testing methodologies. Proficient in **Playwright**, **Selenium**, and **TypeScript**, and experienced with **Python** frameworks like **Django** and **Celery** for robust backend testing. Skilled in database management with **PostgreSQL** and **SQL Alchemy**, and adept at leveraging **Redis** for optimized performance. Strong familiarity with CI/CD tools, including **GitHub Actions**, and infrastructure as code using **Terraform** and **Helm** in **k8s** environments. Excellent problem-solving abilities and communication skills, with a proven record of delivering high-quality projects for esteemed organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, by integrating AI/ML pipelines and cloud-native solutions on **AWS**, **Azure**, **GCP**, and **Heroku**.

experience.responsibilities:
Utilized **Playwright** and **Selenium** to design and execute automated test scripts for ensuring high-quality web applications with over **200+ test cases** running through CI/CD pipelines.
Developed and maintained web testing frameworks using **TypeScript** and **Python**, ensuring compatibility across different browsers and devices.
Integrated **GitHub Actions** for continuous integration and deployment, facilitating rapid feedback loops and versioned releases with **weekly deployment** cycles.
Collaborated with development teams to implement testing solutions that address user stories, improving productivity by **30%** through enhanced testing coverage and efficiency.
Optimized data handling in testing configurations using **Django** and **SQL Alchemy**, achieving a **50% reduction** in database query times during testing.
Managed cloud resources for testing environments using **Terraform** and **k8s**, allowing for easy scalability and consistency across environments, with **5+ environments** deployed in **Azure** and **Heroku**.
Applied strong communication skills to facilitate cross-team collaboration and foster a problem-solving mindset among team members, leading to quicker resolution of integration challenges.

Utilized **Python** and **FastAPI** for backend development, enhancing document workflows and user onboarding processes, resulting in a **30%** reduction in processing time.
Implemented robust testing frameworks with **Playwright** and **Selenium** ensuring quality assurance across **React** applications, leading to a **95%** success rate in test coverage.
Automated deployment processes using **GitHub Actions** and **Terraform**, enabling consistent and scalable microservices on **Azure App Services** and minimizing deployment errors by **40%**.
Developed event-driven architectures with **Celery** and **Redis** for seamless asynchronous data handling, optimizing transaction request processing by **35%**.
Engineered secure data pipelines with **Apache Airflow** and **Azure Functions**, which facilitated regulatory data exchange while streamlining workflows.
Conducted comprehensive security audits, implementing **OAuth2** and **Azure AD B2C** for secure authentication measures and compliance with industry standards.
Collaborated actively within agile teams, driving successful release management and ensuring regulatory compliance through effective communication and problem-solving skills.

Utilized **Selenium** and **Playwright** for automated testing to ensure the stability and reliability of web applications, improving test coverage by **30%**.
Developed testing frameworks using **TypeScript** to enhance automation processes for frontend applications developed with **React**, leading to a **25%** reduction in bug reports.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement **OpenAPI** specifications for thorough and efficient API testing, reducing integration errors by **40%**.
Built and maintained backend services using **Python**, **Django**, and **PostgreSQL**, ensuring robustness in trade execution and account tracking for high-stakes environments.
Engineered real-time data processing with **Redis** and implemented job queuing strategies using **Celery** and **RabbitMQ**, contributing to a **50%** increase in task efficiency.
Executed CI/CD pipelines with **GitHub Actions**, ensuring automated deployments and testing in an **Agile** environment, leading to faster delivery cycles.
Practiced comprehensive error handling and debugging skills to enhance problem-solving capabilities, while maintaining clear communication across teams about project status and issues.
